name: Trix Scores
description:
Trix Scores calculates your Trix game scores for you without going through the hassle of multiplying, adding and subtracting points. All you need to do is select your cards and your scores are calculated! Trix Scores lets you:

- Choose a singles or teams game.
- Double cards (king of hearts, girls).
- Edit your scores for any game and any kingdom at any time!
- Save and continue your scores any time.
- Be alerted when a teams game concludes because of a big score difference.

NOTE: This is a score calculation app NOT the game.
---------------------------------------------
